segments.text: May I have your ticket and passport please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you are . I'd like a window seat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . Put your baggage on the scale , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Here's your ticket , boarding pass , passport and baggage claim tag . You'll be boarding at Gate 8 . The boarding time is 9 a . m .
segments.speaker: S2
